participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily loves sports and strives for excellence in everything she does.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, Jake enjoys meeting new people and cherishes his friendships.
participant_2.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.
